edge_setup_confirmation_subtitle: Your VPN location is now fully configured.
edge_setup_add_multiple_edge_components_: Each location can include multiple Edge components. You may add another component at this stage or return and do it later.
edge_setup_page_subtitle: To activate localization, make sure at least one Edge component is connected.
edge_setup_welcome_subtitle: Welcome to the Edge component Setup Wizard. This guide will help you deploy the Edge required for secure and reliable VPN communication.
edge_setup_welcome_deploy_subtitle: Make sure your Edge Component is deployed. If it's already in place, click the button below to configure it in the following steps â€” otherwise deploy it first and return to this wizard.
edge_setup_welcome_docs_text: Before installation, we recommend reading our documentation to understand the system architecture and core components.
edge_setup_welcome_image_alt: Welcome to Edge component setup wizard
edge_setup_step_edge_component_descripti: Set up your VPN proxy quickly and ensure secure, optimized traffic flow for your users.
edge_setup_step_edge_adoption_descriptio: Review the system's checks and see if any issues need attention before deployment.
edge_setup_step_confirmation_description: Your configuration was successful. You're all set.
edge_setup_component_error_grpc_port_max: gRPC Port must be less than 65536
edge_setup_adoption_checking_availabilit: Checking if Edge is available at: {ip_or_domain}:{grpc_port}
edge_setup_step_deploy_description: Before we can adopt a Edge this component needs to be launched. If you already have done so, please go to the next step, if not, please choose one of the desired deployment method bellow.
edge_setup_step_deploy_confirm: Confirm that you have deployed Edge
edge_setup_step_deploy_tabs_docker_subti: In order to launch Edge with Docker, please copy and run the following command:
edge_setup_step_deploy_tabs_package_subt: To add Defguard APT repository and install the package, run the following commands:
edge_setup_step_deploy_tabs_virtual_subt: Download latest Edge Virtual Image (in OVH format) from this url: [{url}]({url}) Prepare a Cloud Init configuration: **{filename}**:
edge_setup_step_deploy_tabs_other_subtit: For other deployment methods, please follow to our documentation section
edge_setup_step_deploy_tabs_other_launch: Launch the VM with the cloud init configuration.
